name: Yonder (itch)
description:
Yonder is a short game where you play as a mail man on a small group of islands.

Deliver packages and help out the residents.

Controls- Mouse and Keyboard:

  • Movement: "WASD"
  • Interaction: "E"

I wanted to add so much more to this (characters, mechanics, boat physics with waves etc.), but I ran out of time :)

Unfortunately the Webgl built doesn't have sound- something to do with FMOD, if you want to play with sound you can download a PC build of the game. Apologies for that.
